Text:
Yew! Nep, coming through with the goods, as usual. 

If i download this before the 25th i'll be capped! SPEW! haha. used the last 10 gigs downloading the Sakhir Grand Prix in 720p, which i'm watching now. and you were right, Shangai was such a good race!! :P

So i guess it's thanks in advance!
:) You're welcome! I'm glad you liked Shanghai race.
Thank you for this game! I couldn't watch it elsewhere and really curious on how Amar'e and Melo cooperated!
